description: Notice of Proposed Procurement The Department of National Defense has a requirement for the items detailed below Item 1, GSIN: N5895, NSN 5895-01-423-2275, KEYBOARD, DATA ENTRY Part No. HE6930IU720, NCAGE 3P780 GENERAL ELECTRIC COOr Part No. PC 113, NCAGE 53711 NAVAL SEA SYSTEMS COMMAND Quantity: 6, Unit of Issue, EA to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt Item 2, GSIN: N5895, NSN 5895-01-423-2275, KEYBOARD, DATA ENTRY Part No. HE6930IU720, NCAGE 3P780 GENERAL ELECTRIC COOr Part No. PC 113, NCAGE 53711 NAVAL SEA SYSTEMS COMMAND Quantity: 13, Unit of Issue: EA to be delivered to CFB Halifax Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering. Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected. The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian goods and/or services. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
full_summary:
# General Notice for Government Procurement
## Tender Details
* **Procurement ID:** PW-23-01026581
* **Solicitation ID:** W8482-231274/A
* **Publication Date:** February 21, 2023
* **Closing Date:** March 23, 2023, 2:00:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)
## Tender Summary
The Department of National Defence invites bids from suppliers for the procurement of data entry keyboards. The tender details are as follows:

### Items to be Delivered
* Item 1: 6 keyboards (Part No. HE6930IU720)
* Item 2: 13 keyboards (Part No. HE6930IU720)

### Delivery Location
The items must be delivered to CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.

### Procurement Requirements
* Bidders must propose prices in Canadian dollars.
* Preference will be given to Canadian goods and/or services.

### Document Submission
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Attachment
The tender document is available for download at the following link:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/21/7e4c786711b97247c494f7458e877b1e/rfp_w8482-231274_-_en.pdf (English)

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/21/5839cc50707f48df658bbeabfb102153/rfp_w8482-231274_-_fr.pdf (French)

## Contact Information
For any queries or concerns, please contact Johan Vizcaya Collado at:
johan.vizcayacollado@forces.gc.ca

Phone: Not Applicable
Fax: Not Applicable
Address: Department of National Defence, 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada. 
## Classification and Description
The goods and services to be procured fall under:
* GSIN: N5895, Miscellaneous Communications Equipment

It is mandatory to submit a bid using the specification and procedures outlined in the tender document. 

Note: The above changes were made in order to meet the requirements of a professional document and for brevity. Some information was removed to reduce redundancy and is deemed non-essential to the procurement process. All pertinent details remain unchanged. 
Link to "Contractors Details" has been removed
